summary: With over 14 years of experience in Software Engineering, I have brought projects from mock-ups to production using JavaScript, TypeScript, and Python. As a full stack development expert, I have always strived to deliver reliable and functional products that cause a wow reaction at first glance. As a team player, I always look to help others and learn from them. For me, Software Engineering is a philosophy, not a simple job.

experience.title: Full Stack Engineer
achievements: Led the continuous development of clients' dApps through full-cycle management: development, delivery, and deployment.
Worked on building core functionalities of the Unchained platform, like the Sia library.
Developed APIs for dApps integrated with MongoDB and PostgreSQL.

experience.title: Frontend Engineer
achievements: Led the migration of SonarCloud issues screen to MIUI using React.
Developed critical features for CaYC methodology and Clean Code Taxonomy.

experience.title: Full Stack Engineer
achievements: Enhanced various mobile application functionalities, enhancing rent processes and stabilizing Bluetooth.

Published the app on leading stores, amplifying customer outreach.

experience.title: Frontend Engineer
achievements: Led multiple valuable contributions into developing Anibis messenger.

experience.title: Full Stack Engineer
achievements: Developed React components for Adobe Content Manager.

experience.title: Frontend Engineer
